title: [Calelith Villa, Upper Hall]
description: Tarnished silver wall sconces flank a window on the northern wall.  Sunlight filters through the jagged, broken glass of the window, illuminating the hall.  Doorways stand open to the east and west.
Tarnished silver wall sconces flank a window on the northern wall.  Moonlight filters through the jagged, broken glass of the window, illuminating the hall.  Doorways stand open to the east and west.
